20110126014909.000|20110126014911.000|CC1|    SKIN OR ALLERGIC REACTIONS

20110126014922.000|20110126014925.000|CC1|   HAD AN ASTHMA ATTACK, HIVES,

20110126014927.000|20110126014930.000|CC1| SWELLING OF THE FACE OR THROAT,
